description: A weird western graphic novel by Rick Spears and Rob G. It stars a nameless bounty hunter who has tracked down his quarry to the town of Lazarus, which he soon finds to be besieged by zombies.
name: Dead West

description:
Story Titles

  • Spirit From the Fire
  • Prisoners of the Sea
  • Trailer of the Night
  • The Living Corpse
  • Bridge of No Return
  • The Queen's Square Statue
  • The Bridal Lake

Chapter Titles

Part 1
  • The Bride
  • The Missing Heart
  • Room 609
Part 2
  • The Music Room
  • Destiny
  • Mistake in the Register
Part 3
  • Back From the Future
  • His Own Case
  • Greed

Story Titles

  • The Doll
  • The Marriage
  • The Match-Maker
  • Destiny
  • Voodoo Signs
  • Demon's Baby
  • Don't Shoot
  • Replacement

Set in a fantastical world of majestic fantasy, Legendlore details the exploits of an elfin warrioress named Silverfawn. A recent tragedy forces her to embark on a journey both outward and inwards as she searches to relieve herself of a deep and gloom filled melancholy. Of course, any journey in the realm of A'zoth means adventure and an insidious plot that threatens the Elven city of Hyljardin is soon uncovered. For those who enjoy fantasy tales such as Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit.
name: Journey of Silverfawn

description: Silverfawn retreats to her former Masters' abode only to discover that there are other visitors there. Knowing of the catastrophe awaiting the elves, she must forget about her past and the death of someone close to her and rise up again to meet the challenge.
name: Unexpected Visitors

description: Anotsu Kagehisa, master swordsman and leader of the rogue Itto-ryu dojo, has sheathed his blade for the moment to join in marriage with the daughter of a swordmaster whose dojo is to be brought under Onotsus’ dark wing. But for a man of action, the formal traditions of feudal Japan can be just as tense and fraught with hidden agendas as the battlefield. And while Anotsu may indulge in a moment of peace, his enemies are not at rest, among them Rin, who has stalked him for years to take revenge for the murder of her parents. Anotsu had best make sure that if he stops to smell the flowers, he doesn’t end up losing his head! Collecting issue #81-89 of the ongoing series.
name: Vol. 13

volume.name: Blade of the Immortal: Mirror of the Soul
Blade of the Immortal: Last Blood

description: Astor races the clock to stop the twisted Homolka from carrying out his threat to destroy the waterfront as his latest work of art.
name: Creator & Destroyer

description: Kidnapped and bound by three Ittoryu warriors, Rin is unable to warn her bodyguard Manji, the immortal swordsman, that he's heading into a trap. To make matters worse, the Itto-ryu possess a large dose of kessen-satsu, the only poison known to damage Manji's blood and severely cripple his regenerative abilities. And is Mugai-ryu assassin Giichi following Manji in order to help rescue Rin … or will he just stick around long enough to finish off any survivors?
name: Vol. 15

description: As Rin frets over her bodyguard Manji's disappearance, she is surprised by the arrival of two traveling warriors, the feisty, headstrong Döa Yoshino and her huge, brutish companion, Isaku Yasono-ökami. Rin quickly regrets her decision to let this strange couple stay with her, but her detective work takes priority when she returns to the stronghold of Habaki Kagamura to search for Manji. Meanwhile, Kagimura's medical examiners begin to test the seemingly immortal Manji, who is imprisoned, chained, and a very unwilling toy in their merciless hands! Hiroaki Samura's acclaimed Blade of the Immortal has won awards across the globe, including the Eisner Award in America and the prestigious Media Arts Award of Japan. Intense and audacious, Blade takes period samurai action and deftly combines it with a modernist street idiom to create a style and mood like no other work of graphic fiction.
name: Vol. 16

description: Manji, the immortal swordsman, lies imprisoned in the bakufu stronghold of the mysterious Habaki Kagimura. Seeking to impart the life-extending powers of Manji's kessen-chu bloodworms to other humans, Kagimura orders his medical examiners to discover the secrets of Manji's amazing regenerative abilities. Using a series of convicts as live subjects in an increasingly grisly series of twisted experiments, Burando, Kagimura's lead medical examiner, begins to grow more desperate and sickened with each horrifying failure. And through it all, Manji lives, and regenerates, and bides his time for the moment that he can pay back his tormentors . . . limb by limb! Dark, violent, and yet possessing subtle emotional depth, Blade re-invents the traditional period samurai tale by imbuing it with a streetwise modernist sensibility to create an epic tale of incomparable skill and audacious reach.
name: Vol. 17

volume.name: Blade of the Immortal: On the Perfection of Anatomy

description: The immortality of the captive Manji is being sorely tested, as the horrifying experiments commanded by Habaki Kagimura in the dungeons below Edo castle continue. One of Kagimura's doctors, Ayame Burando, has already gone half-mad, tormented by the sickening mutilations intended to unlock the secret of passing Manji's amazing regenerative powers to others, and Burando's replacements have upped the ante with their utter incompetence. Meanwhile, Manji's charge, Rin, is desperately trying to find him, but Edo's brutal police are on her trail, and the race is on for Rin to free her immortal bodyguard before she joins him behind bars!
name: Vol. 18

volume.name: Blade of the Immortal: The Sparrow Net

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 441 released on November, 2000.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 441 released on December, 2007.
name: Springfield Calibro 58

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 442 released on December, 2000.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 442 released on January, 2008.
name: Un Ranger in Pericolo

description: The time for reconnaissance, planning, and waiting is over! Rin and Döa, desperate to be reunited with their friends (or even reassured that they're alive), take their first bold steps in penetrating Edo Castle's defenses and foiling Kagimura's foul "immortality" experiments! A trip to an old doctor, a chance encounter with a high-strung peasant, and an appearance by a strange, all-new Itto-ryü warrior combine to make this volume an important series of encounters in persistent Rin's quest to find Manji and Isaku--and in her own growth as a warrior! The "Badger Hole" is a dank passageway that leads to an underground tunnel system beneath Edo Castle.
name: Vol. 19

volume.name: Blade of the Immortal: Badger Hole

description:
A massive, 280-page volume brings readers back into the "Badger Hole" with Rin and Doa, as they make some shocking discoveries and finally find their missing companions! When Rin bumps into Toraemon, the unfortunate assistant to crazy Doc Burando and witness to his disgusting "immortality experiments," it seems that breaking Manji free will be a breeze. Not so. Getting Manji out of Edo's nightmarish underground cells and dank tunnel systems will be just as arduous as the ordeal of locating him was! More secrets about fan-favorite Döa's past are revealed, and we get a bittersweet glimpse at her early years traveling with her beloved Isaku. Several old teams are reunited, a mind-blowing battle quickly starts and races us through most of this astonishing volume, and an old villain finally sees some pointed retribution at the hands of one of his prisoners! Let the breakout battle in the "Demon Lair" begin!

General Notes

Isaku only appears as one of many corpses disposed of by Burando, although Dōa remains with his body in a state of grief.
name: Vol. 20

volume.name: Blade of the Immortal: Demon Lair

description: A prisoner subjected to Habaki Kagimura and crazy Doc Burando's twisted experiments for far too long, Manji finds himself closer to freedom than ever before-but several colorful villains block his way! While the shogun's executioner matches Manji and Döa's skills, the reborn, powerful Isaku struggles with Asaemon and Kagimura's henchmen. The breakout battle in the tunnels beneath Edo Castle continues! With plenty of mortal enemies to go around, Manji and company are surprised by the appearance of Burando's most horrific kessen-chu success story, just as the already treacherous tunnels begin to flood. Rin tries to remain hopeful, Burando faces the reality of his "immortality experiments" on Manji, and a monstrous villain makes a return appearance!
name: Vol. 21

volume.name: Blade of the Immortal: Demon Lair

description: Hiroaki Samura's latest Blade of the Immortal volume finds Manji and Rin recovering from their harrowing escape out of Edo's underground prisons and finally confronting their odd relationship. Döa and Isaku have something important to announce when Anotsu and the Itto-ryu reunite with their missing members, and Habaki Kagimura faces a death sentence! To atone for his failures and sins, Kagimura has one month to destroy Anotsu and his crew -- or Kagimura must commit suicide. With his Mugai-ryu assassins disbanded, Kagimura enlists even stranger felons than before, creating the frightening, new Rokki-dan gang. With his colorful cast expanding, Samura's knack for creating memorable characters and his masterful ability to dovetail multiple plot lines into each other are evident in this new volume, which also packs a powerful surprise ending!
name: Vol. 22

description: To atone for the atrocities committed under his watch, Habaki Kagimura is no longer the top general for Edo castle and the shogunate, and he must commit ritual suicide. While his replacement gave the despised Itto--ryu gang a reprieve and an order to leave Edo and remain in exile, Kagimura still has one shot to redeem himself. Desperate and with very little time left, he's assembled his Rokki--dan warriors--with Kagimura's own daughter among their numbers--and he now seeks to hunt down and wipe out the Itto--ryu for good. But in his haste, will he fall for a string of traps planned by Anotsu, their devious leader? Freed and unfazed by his time in Edo's dungeons, Manji searches for his missing limb, and a few old friends return to the pages of this action--filled, epic manga series. Hiroaki Samura's widely acclaimed Blade of the Immortal manga series has won awards across the globe, including the Eisner Award in America, the prestigious Media Arts Award of Japan, and several British Eagle Awards! Samura is the creator of the enchanting Ohikkoshi manga anthology and the hardcover The Art of Blade of the Immortal--also published by Dark Horse Manga!
name: Vol. 23

volume.name: Blade of the Immortal: Scarlet Swords

description:
It's good to be free, as time goes by...  Free from it all, from every law and rule, from any reality, any overwhelming part of life. All around Dylan, the world goes mad, while the dreams of freedom are transformed into monsters of revenge.
It is a journey into the deeper states of mind that the investigator undertakes with the lovely Sinead. A trip to a perfect , eternal hallucination ...
name: La clessidra di pietra

description: A group of masked priests, who clamis themselves as Sons of Seth, are trying  to revive the ancient mummy of Nectas, practicing human sacrifice in the heart of London . Dylan, however, is not convinced. Someone is playing a double game and uses Egyptian mysteries as screens for a personal vendetta . But the murderers will have to deal with... the Mummy itself!
name: La Mummia
Il tunnel dell'orrore

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 443 released on January, 2001.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 443 released on February, 2008.
name: Il Ritorno della Tigre Nera
I conigli rosa uccidono
Dopo mezzanotte
Ti ho visto morire
Lama di Rasoio
Grand Guignol
Goblin
Scritto con il sangue

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 444 released on February, 2001.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 444 released on March, 2008.
name: La Laguna Morta
Horror Paradise
Il mistero del Tamigi
Ai confini del tempo

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 445 released on February, 2001.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 445 released on April, 2008.
name: La Notte degli Zombi

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 446 released on March, 2001.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 446 released on May, 2008.
name: Bufera Sulle Montagne Rocciose

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 447 released on April, 2001.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 447 released on June, 2008.
name: Scorta Armata

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 448 released on May, 2001.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 448 released on July, 2008.
name: Caccia ai Diamanti
Il marchio rosso
Delirium

description: Mysterious shadows haunt the Forest of Shin, dancing in the wind and killing children. Who animated these dready spectres? Georg Roll, a medium, knows the answer, but he cannot tell it to anybody, not even to himself.
name: Ombre

description: Dylan and Groucho are back to Inverary, a place in Scotland where noone never is born, and noone really dies. where no illness can spread and where time itself is frozen into an eternal stillness. A travel to the origin of time, beyond death, memory, and the bounds of reality
name: Ritorno al crepuscolo
Gente che scompare

description: The ties are broken, the physicians are dead and a horrible monster is free to roam in London and kill... Who is the nameless giants wandering about? what amazing powers does he have? Who gave them to him and why?  Once again facts are not how they look like.
name: Frankenstein

description: A man meets in dream the soul of an extraterrestrial intelligence that wants to get in touch with him, to tell him something vital. With the help of Dr. Bronsky, Dylan tries to plumb the depths of his tormented mind. He will discover that the human unconscious is as vast as the infinite outer space ... and maybe more!
name: Terrore dall'infinito

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 449 released on June, 2001.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 449 released on August, 2008.
name: Gli Uomini che Uccisero Lincoln

description: Who was Mr. Martinez? A drug dealer or the keeper of a terrible secret? Why the army has killed him so easily? In sunlight, in everyday life, everything looks "normal". But something escapes beneath the surface, something invisible devours us, hypnotize us, and sucks our blood. The face of power is clean and smiling, but that smile is made ​​of fangs ...
name: I vampiri

description:
The Keepers are falling one by one. Witches, warlocks and occultists throughout the world are murdered by a mysterious angel with one thousand faces. Kim the Witch - an old acquaintance of Dylan - and his enchanted cat Cagliostro are the last remaining. But what do they keep ? The Maelstrom, the gate of Hell that opens every 666 years. This time, cosmic forces are at play and the investigator of the nightmares must decide 
which side to take.
name: Maelstrom!

description:
Letters from a young admirer attract Dylan and Groucho to a remote village in the heart of Wales. In Ramblyn they are caught in the middle of a web of secrets, intrigues and follies, while a dreadful monster comes out of a cave at night devouring people.
For the second time, a Dylan Dog story is split in two, across this issue and the next.
name: I segreti di Rambyn

description:
Following the call of young Katinka Jones, Dylan Dog and Groucho are in Ramblyn, Wales, trying to solve the mystery of a dready monster that devours people. This and other mysteries are woven into a more and more tangled plot. The key is at hand, in the images of a fading dream. We must follow them to the bowels of the earth...
The story follows from the previous issue.
name: La belva delle caverne

description: Harvey Burton, being in a coma, is playing chess with Death to save his soul. Each of his error on the board kills someone in the real world , and the game goes on . Dylan Dog follows the moves , but does not know how to stop them . His fifth and a half sense tells him something , but what ? Perhaps the game is rigged . Maybe he's cheating ... Death himself ?
name: Partita con la morte

description:
The mild Matthew Pascal disappears for seven years and , instead , appears Adrian Mehis , hardened criminal , a real devil . But when the two sides come together , all hell breaks loose ! 
A Dylan-style version of a famous novel by Luigi Pirandello, mixed with references to many other double identity stories.
name: L'uomo che visse due volte

description: Mana Cerace is alive ! Once again, the sticky dweller of the dark consumes  its raids by night . But why in Brentford ? The monster is back to its origins , where his ghostly existence was freed from the mortal remains . Perhaps he is launching a challenge to Dylan Dog , perhaps a warning , a threat ... or just a trap ? The answer is hiding in the night of Brentford.
name: Lo spettro nel buio

description: It's hard times for comics... Modern inquisitors are launching a crusade against this c hildhood mischief , evil seducers of innocence , and cause of any moral decay . And for Justin Moss, a harmless comic artist, things are turning bad.
name: Caccia alle streghe

description: They sprout from the darkness and descend on travelers as a horde of barbarians . They are the Gang of the Wood , a crew of ruthless killers , mutants with mysterious powers that kill for pleasure . The only survivor of their fury is the young Meggan Page, and Dylan must protect her at all costs . But in the the thick of the forest , anything can happen, and while the game rages on , the hunter can become prey.
name: Il bosco degli assassini

description: What can one alien do with a single knife on an island packed full of some of the most powerful mutants on Earth? Anything he wants -- as long as none of them are awake. Revenge runs red and debts are bloodily settled as BREAKING POINT approaches its climax.
name: Breaking Point, Part 3

description:
With a worldwide war raging between humans and monsters, the young delivery men of the Gaya Desert Post Office do not pledge allegiance to any country or king. They are banded together by a pledge to deliver. Fast. Precise. Secure. Banya, the craziest and craftiest of the bunch, will stop at nothing to get a job done. Known as the Explosive Delivery Man for his risk taking, bold resolve, and impeccable record, Banya agrees to complete a wounded soldier's mission to transport a parcel of great importance--not knowing what dangers lie in store for him and his friends! As their arduous journey begins, Banya promises, "There isn't a delivery I can't make. I always deliver."

Kim Young-Oh's fantastical world is filled with unique monsters, vicious swordplay, and a dash of hotfooted humor.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 1: A Man With A Job
  • Chapter 2: Boy and Girl
  • Chapter 3: The Messenger
  • Chapter 4: Trackers
  • Chapter 5: Separation
  • Chapter 6: Gorigon Woods

Young Kong is entrusted with a delivery of great importance, and Banya schemes to free Mei from her captors. Instead of fighting fire with fire, Banya fights monsters with monsters! The delivery men of the Gaya Desert Post Office have only one motto: “Fast. Precise. Secure.” Banya, the craziest and craftiest of the bunch, will stop at nothing to get a job done. Known as the “Explosive Delivery Man” for his daring, dedication, and diligence, Banya promises, “There isn’t a delivery I can’t make!” Whether it’s transporting a rare artifact or reuniting a mother with her long-lost son, Banya will speed through war-torn deserts and mysterious forests, relying on flexibility, daring, and wits to complete his missions—no matter what the odds! Kim Young-Oh presents a world filled with unique monsters, heated battles, and a splash of saucy humor.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 7: Mei's Rescue, Part 1
  • Chapter 8: Mei's Rescue, Part 2
  • Chapter 9: Work Accomplished!
  • Chapter 10: Motherhood, Part 1
  • Chapter 11: Motherhood, Part 2
  • Chapter 12: Motherhood, Part 3
  • Chapter 13: Indomitable

The cunning and intrepid Banya faces his greatest challenge yet! The unstoppable delivery man finds himself in the middle of a mysterious dispute at the heart of a sacred temple-trapped between devout warrior-priests and the vicious, ruthless Torren! But Banya pledges allegiance to no religion or country, only to the motto of the Gaya Desert Post Office: "Fast. Precise. Secure." Banya's certainly no stranger to mayhem, and he proudly asserts, "There isn't a delivery I can't make!" This time, however, have he and his young cohort Kong bitten off more than they can chew?

Kim Young-Oh's latest action-packed romp is filled with tense battles, horrific villains and monsters, and perfectly-timed comedic moments.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 14: In the Heart of the Mountains
  • Chapter 15: Battle At Chamhwe Temple
  • Chapter 16: The Breaking of the Seal
  • Chapter 17: Return of the Summoned
  • Chapter 18: A Kid Named Mido
  • Chapter 19: The Road Home
  • Chapter 20: Save Mido!
  • Chapter 21: Awakening

After last volume's shocking cliffhanger, Banya's screams are still ringing across Gaya's wastelands, and the desert deliverymen are in some serious danger. The future is at stake, and fists are about to fly, as two bloodthirsty villains corner our heartbroken hero. He's kept his cool while mingling with the monstrous Torren, fighting off gargantuan pit bulls, and dodging the giant Gwichi worm's sneak attacks-but now Banya has gone crazy with anguish and rage and is about to unleash a world of hurt on two mutated killers! This second-to-last volume of Banya: The Explosive Delivery Man isn't all gloom and doom, though, as Kim Young-Oh continues to mix incredible artwork and fast-paced storytelling with perfectly timed slapstick moments and surprising plot twists.

In an exciting volume of nonstop action, the story of Banya: The Explosive Delivery Man comes to an end! Banya races to deliver his most important "package" ever-the powerful summoner Jiahn-to the aptly named Land of Death. Jiahn must reach her destination before an extraordinary evil is unleashed upon Gaya, but a vicious pack of warriors and monsters, led by the villainous Kamutu, closes in quickly. When Banya regains his memory, will he slip back into the role of a brutal killer and join Kamutu, or will his love for his friends at the Gaya Desert Post Office overcome the pull of a violent, rage-filled past?

Kim Young-Oh delivers a brilliantly illustrated climax to this action-packed series. This series is presented in its original Korean format and translated by the mother/son team of Taesoon Kang and Derek Kirk Kim!

After surviving the AGE OF X, Rogue and Magneto recognize that they've been through a lot together - and grown closer because of it. But when Rogue forces Magneto to confront the horrors of his past, their relationship may just reach a breaking point. Also, Frenzy makes a pretty drastic change to her life. A new direction for X-MEN: LEGACY begins here! You don't want to miss out on it!
name: Age of X: Aftermath, Part Two

description: Some strange murderings happen at "Hiroshima mon amour", a bar for singles. The modus operandi leaves the suspect that the killer is a woman. Like a mantis, she first mates with the male, then she kills him.
name: I delitti della mantide

description: Six years ago young Mary Ann was the victim of Blucher sisters' experiments, and was forced to have a child from a wolf. Now the infant is grown, and his feral rage is unleashed.
name: Le notti della luna piena

description: Killer clowns, tree-men, winged eyes, giant uintestinal worms and other bizarre monsters spread death across the streets of London. The reason seems to be a macabre competition among demons. Is the fate of humankind being determined  by a roll of dice?
name: Armageddon!

description:
Inspired by a novel by Raymond Chandler, a struggling romance for Dylan Dog.

An old love of Dylan's comes to visit him. She does not want to hire him for a case, just wants him to take her home. For a last, long, good-bye.
name: Il lungo addio
Il tagliagole

description: Kirk Bowers accidentally kills a black child in a rough neighborhood of London . The judge, a friend of his , absolves him of any crime . So the father of the child will turn to voodoo  rites to have justice .
name: Maledizione nera

description: Quite unusually, this issue features two different stories. In the first, Dylan travels to a different universe, where is the last man living on earth...
name: L'ultimo uomo sulla terra

description: A young girl moves to London looking for success, but three men dressed in black come out from her nightmare to kill her. While the three spread terror across the city, she goes to Dylan asking for shelter.
name: I killer venuti dal buio

description: A girl called Banshee O'Connor is convinced to be cursed, because her parents and all of her closest friends have died. When her father comes back from death she goes to ring Dylan's bell.
name: La fata del male

description: Doctor Killex is a scientist who enjoys skinning his victims . But his is a noble purpose: he is searching for the place of the human soul...
name: Il cervello di Killex

description: Johnny is a freak of nature: a man without legs and with two long arms he uses to move around. Also he has just one lung and one kidney. But facts are not how they seem: Johnny was born a healthy boy, and somebody let him so. This time the horror is too much even for the investigator of the nightmare, but he can not just turn his head away, and he will find the truth, at any cost.
name: Johnny Freak

description: Archaeologist John Pleasance is working on the excavation of a site dating back thousands of years ago : a celtic cave dedicated to Shamain , the lord of death. Inside the cave an inscription bears the words " away from light , the ineffable splendor ". It is not the only mystery of the site , where the darkness of the underground labyrinths hide memories from an alchemy laboratory and attendance that does not seem human . Dylan is hired by Rebecca , wife of John , which posits that a monster sighted in the cave is the cause of the death of her husband . The nightmare investigator will be forced to wander up to the furthest reaches of the dark to find the truth hidden in the depths of the human soul .
name: Lontano dalla luce
Doktor Terror

description:
Zed is the name of a paradise land where everyone would like to go ... but you have to pay   a lot of money to enter and to risk being shot by ruthless snipers defending the only existing gate .
 
Also published in english by Dark Horse in 2003.
name: Zed

description: After taking part in a spiritic session , some children die in strange circumstances . One of the sitters , Peggy , is convinced that they had freed something terrible and supernatural . She hires the nightmare investigator to shed light on the mystery . The deepest fears and insecurities of the five teenagers come to life to drive them to madness , but the origin of everything might be a reason for murder that has its roots in the unconscious of each one.
name: Fantasmi

description: A devil from the hell, named B.L. Phagor, rings at Dylan's bell to ask his advice. Meanwhile, a weird disease causes a wave of murders...
name: Storia di un povero diavolo

description: The homeless in the suburbs of London began to rebel and kill their detractors in the holy days of Christmas . One of them, Julius , sees his friends turning into monsters before committing crimes , so he  asks the investigator of nightmare  for advice...
name: Feste di sangue
I cavalieri del tempo

description: Dylan and Groucho have to travel to Canada and, since the investigator of nightmare is afraid of flying, they embark on a ship with a grim name: Titanic. On board the passengers start dying one by one.
name: Titanic
